spec_data.Name: claws-mail-plugins-address-keeper
spec_data.Description:
This plugin allows saving outgoing addresses to a designated folder
in the address book. Addresses are saved only if not found in the
address book to avoid unwanted duplicates.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 17 Sep 2017 05:07:08 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Never forget a typed address in Claws Mail
